document.full_text: the top-seeded vancouver canucks moved within one win of the western conference finals after they overcame the nashville predators 4-2 on thursday.
document.title: canucks push predators to the brink with 4-2 win
lines_and_colors: the top-seeded vancouver canucks moved within one win of the western conference finals after they overcame the nashville predators 4-2 on thursday.
